comments.comment:
chorus 2 (played at the end)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
Worthy is the Lamb
To receive power and riches
And wisdom and might And honor
Blessing and honor and glory
And dominion forever
Worthy is the Lamb

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Power (Power)
Riches (Riches)
Wisdom and might
And blessing and honor
And dominion forevermore

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Power (Power)
Riches (Riches)
Wisdom and might
And blessing and honor
Worthy is the Lamb
